original_text: At that time, the Lord Almighty will receive gifts from the people of that land. Many rivers cross that land. Its people are tall and their skin has no hair. Everyone is afraid of them. Their nation is strong and powerful. Those people will bring their gifts to Mount Zion. That is the place that the Lord Almighty has chosen for people to worship him there.
korean_text: 그 때에 강들이 흘러 나누인 나라의 장대하고 준수한 백성 곧 시초부터 두려움이 되며 강성하여 대적을 밟는 백성이 만군의 여호와께 드릴 예물을 가지고 만군의 여호와의 이름을 두신 곳 시온 산에 이르리라

sentences.original_text: At that time, the Lord Almighty will receive gifts
sentences.korean_translation: 그 때에 전능하신 주께서는 선물을 받으실 것입니다
